comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Sorry I missed you guys. I was wrestling mightily with guilt as I plowed through chicken curry and jasmine rice. Guilt won. You'd think that after twenty years of noon-hour workouts I could sneak in a sit-down lunch once in a while w/out feeling like I was drowning kittens or whatnot. One more lunch date this week, then it's back to business. Overweight in ATLAS, DU
